headline: Lockheed Martin awarded $579M Missile Defense Agency contract modification
summary: Lockheed Martin (LMT) was awarded a contract modification with an estimated value of $579M under Foreign Military Sales, or FMS, Case JA-P-NCO with the Japan Ministry of Defense. Under this modification, the contractor will continue to develop, test and integrate equipment, material, software and hardware end items in support of the Aegis System Equipped Vessel, or ASEV, and deliver the system to Japan. The work will be performed in Moorestown, New Jersey. The period of performance for this acti
